description:
FOCV is developed based on blockchain technology, breaking the pattern of "Western Medicine" monopolizing the medical market, creating a decentralized and peer-to-peer trading ecosystem serving the global Chinese medicine industry, and establishing a trusted medical health care Medical research, TCM medical data value sharing network.

FOCV is suitable for massive blockchain Chinese medicine application scenarios. At the application level, it can be expected that the blockchain will serve as the underlying foundation support for institutions and even individuals in work and life. FOCV uses modularity, multi-chain parallelism, smart contracts, etc. The operating mechanism, FOCV will also build its own bottom layer of the platform, providing basic modules for each node participating in the platform to publish its own personalized business applications, which facilitates the rapid organization and deployment of applications. FOCV provides support for responding to various future Chinese medicine application scenarios and different needs at the bottom of the blockchain.
name: FOCV
